description: Samsung is a diverse multinational conglomerate, known for electronics, mobile devices, appliances, and more.
office_location: Seoul, South Korea and various global offices
job_responsibility: As an Android App Developer at Samsung, you will create cutting-edge mobile applications for Android devices. Your responsibilities include developing, testing, and optimizing Android apps, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and staying up-to-date with the latest mobile development trends.
educational_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
